ModMetaData.name: Absolute Legends Apparel
ModMetaData.author: RE6AL
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla style Eastern Europe apparel. Cuz thats where I live and... I believe in a world of cannibalism and raids there must be chracters from around here. Without Gopniks Rimworld seems a bit off.. They are the real pirates of modern day and age.
Wait...Do you hear it??...
...RAS RAS RAS this is HARDBASS, everybody wear SPORTIVKI ABIBAS, и на найке пацаны...
